title: VSF Fahrradmanufaktur GX-1200 adds gravel to German-made steel adventures bikes
content:
German bike builder VSF Fahrradmanufaktur has added a new GX gravel bike to their range, calling it an expansion into more “sporty” bike production. Leading up to their 35th anniversary next year, the new limited first edition GX-1200 gravel bike will combine a classic Columbus steel frame with a premium Campagnolo Ekar 1x 13-speed build… […]

The post VSF Fahrradmanufaktur GX-1200 adds gravel to German-made steel adventures bikes appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
